channel.title: BlueGhost PG Now & Next @ 8:23
channel.description: Now and Next for a selection of channels
channel.copyright: Data From backstage.bbc.co.uk, bleb.org, code by Michael Pritchard (blueghost.co.uk)

item.title: BBC One - Holby City ( 20:00 )
item.description: Learning Curve: Diane passes her consultant's exam, but is she ready for promotion? Connie learns that Elliot can be a pillar of support. Meanwhile, Dean's future hangs in the balance. [AD,S]

item.title: BBC One - Shipmates ( 21:00 )
item.description: After the Wave: HMS Chatham reaches the eastern coast of Sri Lanka, which took the full force of the tsunami. Helicopters are launched to recce the scene of devastation.

item.title: BBC Two - Dragons' Den ( 20:00 )
item.description: The dragon investors are confronted by a party plan with a difference, a new type of bodybuilding nutrition, a revolution in shaving and a motorised surfboard.

item.title: BBC Two - Making Slough Happy ( 21:00 )
item.description: The experts have their work cut out if they want to improve the lot of the Slough resident volunteers. A survey revealed they were only marginally happier than people in former Soviet bloc countries.

item.title: ITV 1 - The Bill ( 20:00 )
item.description: An anonymous caller alerts Phil Hunter to common threads in recent murders, and the team start looking for a serial killer on the Sun Hill gay scene. Lance Powell struggles to come to terms with Mark's decision to take time out from their relationship and decides to drown his sorrows, but a visit to the gay bar he recently investigated puts him in grave danger

item.title: ITV 1 - I'm a Celebrity Get Me Out of Here! ( 21:00 )
item.description: Ant and Dec present the celebrity survival challenge, revealing which famous face will be leaving the Australian jungle after gaining the smallest number of public votes

item.title: Channel 4 - Property Ladder ( 20:00 )
item.description: With house prices no longer soaring, can amateur property developers still cash in on the property game? Sarah Beeny gives newcomers to the business advice and tips on how to make money from property - but will they listen?

item.title: Channel 4 - Wife Swap USA ( 21:00 )
item.description: In tonight's episode of the award-winning Wife Swap, a career obsessed, workaholic mum swaps lives with an over-protective mother.

item.title: five - The Da Vinci Code Myth: Revealed ( 20:00 )
item.description: Documentary examining the conspiracy theories that inspired Dan Brown's bestselling novel. The programme examines stories of a breakaway Christian sect who were wiped out by the Catholic church in the Middle Ages, a secret document claiming that Christ had a child, and the mysterious activities of the Knights Templar. Plus, a look at why Leonardo Da Vinci might have wanted to attack the church in such a clandestine way

item.title: five - CSI: Miami ( 21:00 )
item.description: Horatio investigates a video game company when one of their testers is found dead. Meanwhile, a former porn star looks for protection from a producer who is trying to blackmail her
